# Juan Esquivel

> Lore maximalist. Head of Marketing at StableLab. Building brand, narrative, and lore in crypto. Based in Lisbon, Portugal.

Juan Esquivel is a crypto marketer specializing in brand strategy, content marketing, and storytelling for Web3 companies. He leads marketing at StableLab, a DAO governance infrastructure company. Previously, he was Content Lead at Boardroom. He writes about crypto marketing, building brands, storytelling, and working at startups.

## Core Information

- Name: Juan Esquivel
- Location: Lisbon, Portugal
- Role: Head of Marketing at StableLab
- Twitter/X: @0xCadena
- Email: juanesquivel138@gmail.com
- Personal brand: "lore maximalist"

## Expertise

- Crypto/Web3 Marketing
- Brand Strategy & Narrative Design
- Content Marketing
- DAO Governance
- Storytelling for Startups
